metadata.dc:author: Torbeña, J
Vila Torres, J
Ferrer, A L
Vernet, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of Reye's syndrome is reported with peculiar characteristics of neurological focality and important cerebral edema of the opposite side. The present knowledge of genetic factors in the development of Reye's syndrome encephalopaty is briefly discussed and, also, the possible vascular role in this definite case.
metadata.dc:title: Edema cerebral unilateral en un caso de sídrome de Reye
[Unilateral brain edema in a case of Reye's syndrome (author's transl)].
